welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Maria Chiquimula, the charming city known for its beautiful colonial architecture, vibrant market, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quiche Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quiche Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Quetzaltenango Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Quetzaltenango Airport, including imports and exports.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huehuetenango Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
